## Interpretation

Allows evaluation of:

* Chamber volumes
* Cause of hypertrophy
	* Hypertension
	* Odematous/inflammatory
	* Diffuse fibrosis
	* Fabry's
	* Sarcoidosis\
	Late gadolinium enhancement on the inferolateral wall.
	* Amyloidosis
	* Haemochromatosis/iron deposition
* Ischaemia\
Gadolinium enhancement.
* Thrombus\
No gadolinium enhancement.
